OrgName.entry: SOUTH YORKSHIRE INTERNATIONAL TRADE CENTRE (SYITC) - LANGUAGE SERVICES

Desc.entry: Provides a full language service including translation, interpreting and tailored language tuition in various languages for local, national and international companies and members of the public alike. Including but not specific to: Commercial & Legal, Marketing, Operating Manuals, Websites, Personal Data, Type Setting and Technical Datasheets. Company Limited by Guarantee No. 64569.
